entry.title: Comments on BOLT#11
entry.summary: A payment request has been made using UTF-8 description. The code used to separate encode from sign is ln.sign(ln.encode). The results have shown the coinType as testnet, payeeNodeKey as 03e7156ae33b0a208d0744199163177e909e80176e55d97a2f221ede0f934dd9ad, paymentRequest as lntb1pdz7e9epp5qqqsyqcyq5rqwzqfqqqsyqcyq5rqwzqfqqqsyqcyq5rqwzqfqypqdpquwpc4curk03c9wlrswe78q4eyqc7d8d0e5l2jffz6amujxz82mtagde82dv8jku2jac79k0yxnjmr0l3f4y5x0jxt46vmcrc0ukzh7l99vdmkezsettfwr4gqnhs2ndx8wdqgfsp82rnvp, recoveryFlag as 1, satoshis as null, signature as cd3ea92522d777c9184756d7d437275358795b8a9771e2d9e434e5b1bff14d49433e465d74cde0787f2c2bfbe52b1bbb6450cad6970ea804ef054da63b9a0426, tags with tagName and data, timestamp as 1513055417 and timestampString as 2017-12-12T05:10:17.000Z.
